div.ab: VVrS7.22c-e: zōt ud rāspīg: vid. VrS7.27, 4025.

RecitationInstruction.ab: VrS27.7f ... ϑβōi staōtarascā] (Per.) rāsfī yekbār ḫvānad ϑβōi staōtarascā 4025.

Y7.27e-f mazdā ahurā ϑβōi staōtarascā...] MN ϑβōi staōtarascā OD OL Y mazdā ahurā II bʾl gwptn' 4010, 4025; MN ϑβōi staōtarascā OD OL mazdā̊ ahurā II bʾl gwptn' 4161; MN ϑβōi staōtarascā OD mazdā̊ ahurā II bʾl gwptn' 4040, 4370; mazdā ahurā II bʾl gwptn' 4030, 4045, 4050; mazdā ahurā II bʾl ϑβōi (Per.) ḫāndan 4075; mazdā̊ ahurā ϑβōistōi.tarascā II 4515.
